lines.text:
[to Ricky]
I bet if you met your father he'd probably be Irish
Don't call Rick's father a spic
I didn't call his old man a *spic*... I called him a *mick*
You're involved in something you know nothing about
Doesn't matter what it is... if you've broken the law you've got to pay for it

[opening the garage door]
I quit too

[taken aback]
That garage door hasn't been able to open in eight years

[about Hojo]
He was the best of us

[bleeding from the mouth]
Tell me where the money is!
